item.description:
Come join us as we explore the fun and wonders of Mother Nature on Earth Day. We'll have a whirl pool to splash in, mountains to climb, a sand pit to explore, & plenty of stuffed animals to enjoy.

Anyone who brings a gently used pet care item or toy to recycle will get a special treat. Proceeds donated to local animal shelters caring for furry friends who have come to us less fortunate due to Mother Nature's weather disasters.

Please: Remember to bring your updated vaccination for Rabies, DHLPP, & Bordatella.

Hope to see you all there!

Love & puppy kisses, Auntie Becky
item.name: Earth Day Extravaganza
